summary: Defense Department personnel and contractors work in depots to keep weapons and equipment ready for use. These depots must have the ability to meet surges in demand in emergencies. They also must be able to maintain a core of capabilities without overreliance on contractors. DOD reports to Congress every 2 years on the status of depot capabilities, including projected shortfalls. In past reviews, we found...
title: Depot Maintenance: DOD Has Improved the Completeness of Its Biennial Core Report
